  Rees

Misty <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
          Cool email me that evp so I can see if its similar to some of the tones 
I often get before a message begins

Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" 
<purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> 
> There are times when a message will come through wiht kind fo a 
> xylophone sound to it, it's something they create to carry the 
> message. I've even heard this live, in the wind with voices, and have 
> a phone EVP with the sound. 
> 
> Frank-s
>
